name: Blossom Pop -Swipe sweet & color flower
description:
Do you love nature? Have you ever dreamt of having your own little flower garden? Of course your do, that’s why we made Blossom Pop special for flower and puzzle game lovers. Link your way through tons of magic flower-filled gardens to make colorful buds blossom before you run out of moves! And Link 3 or more flowers of the same type to collect this beautiful flowers and blast your own delightful flower garden, your will experience your own flower adventure in this more than 300 addictive puzzle flower games.


Blossom Pop MAIN FEATURES:


●Great visual effects, Beautiful and Brilliant Graphics.
● Create Crazy BOMBS by matching four or more flowers and blast the Garden!
● Unwrap delicious environments and meet the beautiful flower garden!
● Fun game music and sounds to keep the happiness blooming in the blossom flower legend!
● Match Flower and collect all kinds of objects, not only flowers to win the level before you run out of moves.
● Match 4 or more flowers to create Sweet and big combos and blast your way to victory
● Daily events! Collect daily free coins of rewards.
● Fun and easy to play, but Challenging to fully master. Can you score 3 stars on every level?


●Marvelous game modes include:
Honeycomb– Match flowers on the honeycomb to collect the sweet honeycomb
Wooden Box – Match flowers next to the box to break the box and expand your beautiful flower Garden
Water– Water the flower and clean your dirty flowers
Flower Basket – Match Flowers next to the Flower Basket to release the trapped beautiful flowers
Flower – Feed the flower pot with flowers to blossom the fragrant flowers

Download Blossom Pop for free flower linking fun and enjoy your beautiful and amazing adventure!

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Blossom Pop!
